data.description: Stunning and expansive 3,870 SF 3 bed/ 3.5 bath home on a corner lot with 2 bonus rooms, huge roof deck and 2-car garage. Only 5 years old! Sellers upgraded many high-end features during the original construction, including gas fireplace, electric blinds, 3-zone heating/cooling, extra lighting, appliances, custom closets, plus upgraded flooring/tile. No detail was missed! Main level features expansive kitchen with quartz countertops, dining room, living room that leads to the back deck plus a half bath. Second level houses two bedrooms/ baths, including large master suite with many windows, en-suite bathroom and dual custom closets. Second floor laundry! Top level has a light and bright bonus space leading out to a HUGE rooftop with views of the area. Lower level has a bonus game room as well as a separate bedroom and full bath. Quiet neighborhood close to Target, Whole Foods, Giant Eagle, Highland Park, many local restaurants/shopping, Home Depot, etc.
